name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
schedule:
1-4週: Nucleophilic Aromatic Substitution and Synthesis of Aromatic Compounds
5-8週: Addition to Carbon-Heteroatom Double Bonds
第9週: 期中考
10-13週: Substitution of Carbonyl Compounds: Carboxylic Acids and Their Derivatives
14-17週: Substitution alpha and beta to Carbonyl Groups
第18週: 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry: A Mechanistic Approach
Penny Chaloner
